name: UpdateExistingAgent
description:
Update an existing agent in Freshservice.

Use this tool to modify details of an existing agent in the Freshservice platform. It's suitable when you need to change agent information such as name, email, or role.

parameters.name: agent_identifier
parameters.description: ID of the agent to be updated in Freshservice.

parameters.name: agent_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the updated details for the agent, including personal and role-related information.

occasional.description: True if the agent is an occasional agent, and false if full-time agent.

work_phone_number.description: Work phone number of the agent

mobile_phone_number.description: Mobile phone number of the agent

reporting_manager_id.description: Unique identifier of the agent's reporting manager

location_id.description: Unique identifier of the location associated with the agent

scoreboard_level_id.description: Unique ID of the level of the agent in the Arcade. Possible values: * 1 - Beginner * 2 - Intermediate * 3 - Professional * 4 - Expert * 5 - Master * 6 - Guru

scope.description: Access level of the agent in various modules

group_ids.description: <DEPRECATED> Unique IDs of the agent groups associated with the agent

member_of.description: Unique IDs of the agent groups that the agent is a member of

observer_of.description: Unique IDs of the agent groups that the agent is an observer of

role_ids.description: (DEPRECATED) Unique IDs of the agent roles associated with the agent

role_id.description: Unique identifier of the role assigned

assignment_scope.description: The scope in which the agent can use the permissions granted by this role. Possible values are entire_helpdesk (all plans), member_groups (Blossom, Garden, and Estate), specified_groups (Forest only), and assigned_items (all plans)

groups.description: Groups in which the permissions granted by the role applies. Returns an array of group identifiers when the assignment_scope is specified_groups, and null otherwise.

last_login_at.description: Timestamp of the agent's last successful login

active.description: true if the user is active, and false if the user account has been deactivated.

has_logged_in.description: true if the user has logged in to Freshservice at least once, and false otherwise.

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the agent was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which the agent was last modified

value_schema.description: Agent who needs to be updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.
